}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = and encouraged parents to question their children about sexual acts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:48.720
    | text      = Quote, also photos may have been taken of children without their clothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:53.240
    | text      = Jesus.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:54.559
    | text      = Any information from your child regarding having ever observed Ray Buckley to leave
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:58.359
    | text      = a classroom alone with a child during any nap period, or if they had ever observed Ray
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:02.900
    | text      = Buckley tie up a child is important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:06.559
    | text      = Naturally, parental concern can go awry and thus a bunch of new claims were made, though
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:12.480
    | text      = ultimately no evidence of anything was ever found.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:16.119
    | text      = There are many that believe that the case would never have made it to the headlines
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:19.859
    | text      = or even very far into the investigation were it not for timing and politics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:25.559
    | text      = In 1984, LA District Attorney Robert Philibosian was in a very close race for reelection to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:31.500
    | text      = a post he had not initially won.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:34.000
    | text      = He'd been appointed District Attorney after his predecessor had been elected Attorney
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:37.559
    | text      = General of the state of California.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:40.359
    | text      = In the course of his campaign, Philibosian made a big deal of the McMartin case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:45.079
    | text      = From a 1990 article in the LA Times, quote, when the McMartin preschool indictments were
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:49.539
    | text      = first issued in March 1984, then District Attorney Robert Philibosian, facing a tough
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:54.640
    | text      = electoral challenge from Reiner, tried to exploit the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:59.119
    | text      = During pretrial hearings, he sat at the side of the prosecutors in court, a practice not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:03.220
    | text      = seen in at least 15 years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:05.880
    | text      = During recesses, Philibosian conducted hallway press conferences to grab some headlines.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:11.160
    | text      = Just before the primary, Philibosian added 92 counts on top of the already existing 115
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:17.079
    | text      = and increased the number of alleged victims from 18 to 42.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:21.039
    | text      = Robert Philibosian lost his run for the DA office, but the damage had been done, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:25.559
    | text      = by the time his successor, Ira Reiner, took over, the case was too big for it to just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:32.680
    | text      = go away.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:33.960
    | text      = There were allegations of ritualistic abuse against a ton of kids, which was now the biggest
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:38.380
    | text      = story in the country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:40.440
    | text      = Which is a problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:42.079
    | text      = Seven people were ultimately arrested and indicted for these alleged crimes, including
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:45.680
    | text      = Buckley, his mother, and his sister, as well as three teachers at the school.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:50.319
    | text      = All charges were dropped against five of them before the case went to trial, leaving only
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:54.019
    | text      = Ray Buckley and his mother Peggy as co-defendants.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:58.440
    | text      = This was the longest and most expensive trial in US history, ultimately ending up with almost
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:03.559
    | text      = 30 months of testimony and over two months of jury deliberations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:08.240
    | text      = In the end, Peggy was acquitted of all charges, and the jury was deadlocked on 13 of the charges
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:12.420
    | text      = against Ray, with the foreperson of the jury explaining, quote, the interview tapes were
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:16.940
    | text      = too biased, too leading.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:18.920
    | text      = That's the main crux of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:20.759
    | text      = Ray Buckley would go on to be retried, coincidentally around the time when Ira Reiner was attempting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:25.380
    | text      = to run for the office of California Attorney General, and again they would fail to reach
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:29.740
    | text      = a conviction.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:30.920
    | text      = The state decided not to try Ray again, and all charges were dismissed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:34.779
    | text      = The entire affair was a disgrace, and the pain it caused is almost unimaginable.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:39.160
    | text      = From the employees of the school whose lives were ruined, to the children who were terrorized
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:42.819
    | text      = by the media attention in an almost comically long trial, $15 million in taxpayer money
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:48.319
    | text      = was spent to ultimately achieve nothing other than leave emotional scars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:53.680
    | text      = Though it's easy to see some of the political motivations for the prosecution, the ability
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:57.720
    | text      = for it to get there only really happened because of a couple specific people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
